member.name: T:CardGames.War.Moves.SimplePlayerMoveController
member.summary: Represents the simple move controller class. This controller will draw one card and put it in the tray on call.

member.name: T:CardGames.War.Moves.WarPlayerMovementController
member.summary: Represents the war mode move controller class. This controller will draw 2 cards and put them in the tray on call. The first card will be put face down, while the other facing up on top of the first.
